name: Cartwheel
title: getcartwheel.com
shortDescription: Cartwheel is a text-to-animation platform designed to simplify the creation of animations for various digital projects. Users can animate characters for videos, games, apps, advertisements, and social or virtual reality projects just by typing. This tool is ideal for developers, designers, and content creators who need quick and customizable animations. An example use case could be a game developer creating character animations without needing complex animation software.
pros: Supports a wide range of digital projects
cons: May require learning for best results
Limited to the styles and characters provided

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Animaker
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers DIY video animation with assets
